reviewText: Doesn't work in American DVD players. Its a region 2 DVD set and it will not work unless you have a multi-region DVD player. Most retail stores do not sell multi-region DVD players. You can order them. It will work in a ps4 or Xbox one if you switch the regions
Would not play. Total waste of money
It doesn't work, it won't play in amaerica
it won't work in any of my DVD players

The other reviews , are not reviews at all. They got the wrong region and complained on wrong place. This is a single, double sided DVD. Not much in extras. American Graffiti is a classic! It came out when I was13. Loved it, went to the theatre about 6 or 7 times to watch it. More American Graffiti isn't as good as 1st one, but still worth watching. If you want synopsis, please check elsewhere. If your a fan of these movies, this is a great disc(just make sure you get correct region).

this dvd will not play on any dvd in the usa. you must have a special dvd and be in a certain region of the country this is all new to me. I just wanted to purchast amarican graffiti .!!!!! this is the first time I ever had a problem and I hope the last
Was in German and would not play for me.  I contacted seller and got no response. Finally wound up just throwing away to keep from adding clutter to my tiny apartment.
